menuItems.name: Z Money
menuItems.description: Loud candy gas. Great nose and smooth smoke. Customer favorite.

menuItems.name: Gush Mints
menuItems.description: Dark purps with minty sweet gassy funk. Clean smooth smoke.

menuItems.name: Peach Runtz
menuItems.description: Sweet peach flavor with creamy exhale. Light and relaxing high.

menuItems.name: Stoney P
menuItems.description: Heavy stoney effects, relaxing indica. Unique bag appeal.

menuItems.name: Tally Mon
menuItems.description: Exotic strain with sweet banana and funky undertones. Very smooth.

menuItems.name: Gummiez
menuItems.description: Fruity sweet gassy candy-like profile. Great hybrid effects.

menuItems.name: Live Resin Crumble
menuItems.description: Smooth and terpy, made from whole-plant material.

menuItems.name: Crumble (Generic)
menuItems.description: Generic crumble concentrate. Great for infusing or dabbing.
